title: Add business registration credentials to footer

requirements.text: Add UDYAM Registration number 'DL-11-0014598' to the Footer component
acceptanceCriteria: UDYAM Registration number 'DL-11-0014598' is displayed in the Footer component
The registration number is labeled clearly as 'UDYAM Registration' or similar

requirements.text: Add GST Number '07AHPPK1766K1ZU' to the Footer component
acceptanceCriteria: GST Number '07AHPPK1766K1ZU' is displayed in the Footer component
The GST number is labeled clearly as 'GST No.' or similar

requirements.text: Add GeM Seller ID '853B200001112907' to the Footer component
acceptanceCriteria: GeM Seller ID '853B200001112907' is displayed in the Footer component
The ID is labeled clearly as 'GeM Seller ID' or similar

requirements.text: Add email address 'nidhiinfotech@gmail.com' to the Footer component
acceptanceCriteria: Email address 'nidhiinfotech@gmail.com' is displayed in the Footer component
The email is labeled clearly as 'Email' or similar
The email should be clickable as a mailto: link

requirements.text: Organize the business credentials (UDYAM, GST, GeM Seller ID, email) in a visually distinct section within the Footer component that maintains the existing professional aesthetic and does not disrupt the current footer layout with company address, phone numbers, and business hours
acceptanceCriteria: Business credentials are grouped together in a logical section
The credentials section fits cohesively with the existing footer design
All existing footer content (address, phones, hours) remains intact and properly displayed

constraints: Do not modify the existing footer contact information (address, phone numbers, business hours)
Maintain the current professional visual theme and color scheme
nonGoals: Adding additional business information not provided by the user
Creating a separate page for business credentials
